effect.sun_moon: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.

short_effect.sun_moon: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.
